meanings.definition: A person who is the recipient of an action or state
meanings.sent1: The birthday girl was the lucky ee of all the presents.
meanings.sent2: The employee was the ee of the boss's praise.
meanings.sent3: The ee of the surprise party was truly surprised!
meanings.sent4: She became the ee of everyone's attention as soon as she entered the room.
meanings.sent5: The ee of the award was overjoyed and grateful.

meanings.definition: A suffix used to form nouns denoting a person who is the object of a specified action or state
meanings.sent1: The trainee was a new train-ee at the company.
meanings.sent2: The interviewee answered all the questions confidently.
meanings.sent3: The retiree was excited to start a new chapter in life.
meanings.sent4: She was the appointee to lead the project to success.
meanings.sent5: The escapee managed to flee from the scene unnoticed.
